Verses: 1 karththarai Naan Ekkaalaththilum Sthoththirippen; Avar Thudhi Eppodhum En Vaayilirukkum.
2 karththarukkul En Aaththumaa Menmaipaaraattum; Sirumaippattavargal Adhaikkettu Magizhuvaargal.
3 ennodekoodak Karththarai Magimaippaduththungal; Naam Orumiththu Avar Naamaththai Uyarththuvomaaga.
4 naan Karththaraith Thedinen, Avar Enakkuch Sevikoduththu, Ennudaiya Ellaap Bayaththukkum Ennai Neengalaakkivittaar.
5 avargal Avarai Nokkippaarththup Piragaasamadaindhaargal; Avargal Mugangal Vetkappadavillai.
6 indha Ezhai Kooppittaan, Karththar Kettu, Avanai Avan Idukkangalukkellaam Neengalaakki Ratchiththaar.
7 karththarudaiya Thoodhan Avarukkup Bayandhavargalaich Soozhap Paalayamirangi Avargalai Viduvikkiraar.
8 karththar Nallavar Enbadhai Rusiththuppaarungal; Avarmel Nambikkaiyaayirukkira Manushan Baakkiyavaan.
9 karththarutaiya Parisuththavaankale, Avarukkup Payandhirungal; Avarukkup Payandhavarkalukkuk Kuraivillai.
10 singakkuttigal Thaazhchchiyadaindhu Pattiniyaayirukkum; Karththaraith Thedugiravargalukko Oru Nanmaiyung Kuraivupadaadhu.
11 pillaigale, Vandhu Enakkuch Sevikodungal; Karththarukkup Bayappadudhalai Ungalukkup Podhippen.
12 nanmaiyaik Kaanumpati, Jeevanai Virumpi, Neetiththa Naatkalai Apetchikkira Manushan Yaar?
13 un Naavaip Pollaappukkum, Un Udhadugalaik Kabattuvasanippukkum Vilakkik Kaaththukkol.
14 theemaiyai Vittu Vilagi, Nanmai Sey; Samaadhaanaththaith Thedi, Adhaith Thodarndhukol.
15 karththarudaiya Kangal Needhimaangalmel Nokkamaayirukkiradhu; Avarudaiya Sevigal Avargal Kooppidudhalukkuth Thirandhirukkiradhu.
16 theemaiseygiravargaludaiya Peraip Boomiyil Iraamal Atruppogappanna, Karththarudaiya Mugam Avargalukku Virodhamaayirukkiradhu.
17 needhimaangal Kooppidumpodhu Karththar Kettu, Avargalai Avargaludaiya Ellaa Ubaththiravangalukkum Neengalaakkividugiraar.
18 norungunda Irudhayamullavargalukkuk Karththar Sameebamaayirundhu, Narungunda Aaviyullavargalai Ratchikkiraar.
19 needhimaanukku Varum Thunbangal Anegamaayirukkum, Karththar Avaigalellaavatrilum Nindru Avanai Viduvippaar.
20 avanudaiya Elumbugalaiyellaam Kaappaatrugiraar; Avaigalil Ondrum Murikkappaduvadhillai.
21 theemai Dhunmaarkkanaik Kollum; Needhimaanaip Pagaikkiravargal Kutravaaligalaavaargal.
22 karththar Thamadhu Oozhiyakkaararin Aaththumaavai Meettukkollugiraar; Avarai Nambugira Oruvanmelum Kutranjumaraadhu.
